pages.text: He reflected and made a programme
So be he killed, how he made a programme
again be he killed, how he made a programme
Then he looked
then he frowned and made a face
then he turned away considering himself great
then said, “This is nothing but magic derived from the ancient
this is nothing but the statement of man.”
I will make him enter hell
And what will make you realize what hell is
It does not let (anything) to remain nor does it spare
It will burn and darken the skin (of man)
Over it are nineteen

And We have not appointed the guardians of hell, other than the angels, and We have not fixed their number but for the affliction of those who do not believe. So that those who are given the book may be certain and those who believe may increase in belief and those who were given the book and the believers may not be doubtful. And those in whose hearts is a disease and the disbelievers may say, “What does God intend by this similitude?” Thus God leaves to stray whom He wills and He guides whom He wills and no one knows the forces of your Lord except He Himself and this is nothing but a reminder to man
No, by the moon
and the night when it retreats
and the day when it shines
it (the news of hell) is certainly a great
warning to man
to him among you who wills to advance or remain behind
Every soul is held in pledge (security) for that which it earned
except the companions of the right hand
in gardens, asking each other
about the criminals
“What has brought you into the hell?”
They will say, “We were not of those who offered worship (salat)
and we did not feed the poor
and we used to involve ourselves in idle talk with those involved in idle talk
and we used to deny the day of judgment
till (death) which is certain came to us.”
